name: Dull John
description:
This game is about John, enslaved by his day to day habits. The main goal is to help him free himself from this.

Development Team :

Franck Marcel

Guillaume Julien

Aurélien Bauer

Artistic Team :

Guillaume Clausolles

Sound Design :

Tristan Grunert
